# Camilo Bernal (Cami)

> Solution Architect with 23+ years building high-impact software products across FinTech, HealthTech, Transportation, and Government sectors. Currently leading the CoE of Development and Architecture at Sofka (Colombia). Tech-agnostic: expertise spans .NET, Python, TypeScript, Azure, AWS, Kubernetes, AI/LLMs, Event-Driven Architecture, DDD, CQRS, and Platform Engineering. Former software professor, tech community co-organizer, and Scrum Master certified.
